name: Rolling Dice
description:
A submission for GMTK Game Jam 2022. Your task is to reach the goal with your dice, and you may collect stones on the way to gain the ability to jump over walls. Your jumps are as big as the current top-face of the dice. Customizable difficulty and map size. Your goal is to reach the end at the upper right of the map.

Credits:

subwave: Code and music

mina: Art

We used libgdx with Kotlin to build the game. Sorry for not being able to compile it for the browser.
